title: AGV Pista GP RR Iridium Gold Race Visor
features: Designed for AGV Pista/Corsa/K6 visor mechanism
description: The AGV Iridium Gold Race Visor adds aggressive style and sun protection to your Pista GP RR or K6. The mirror coating reduces glare while maintaining excellent optical clarity. Scratch-resistant and UV-treated, it meets the demands of both track and street riding.
